amendment.description: Amendment requires Statewide Family Engagement Centers to conduct training programs in the community to improve adult literacy, including financial literacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 22 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to require Statewide Family Engagement Centers to conduct training programs in the community to improve adult literacy, including financial literacy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Kelly (IL).
